desc: We make unique Wall Art and Home Decor, Art and Craft Kits and offer Art Workshops on the Sunshine Coast. We sell creative DIY art kits. If you are looking for creative things to do on the Sunshine Coast, we can help! Paint & Sip Workshops. At Create A Circus we love art, creating and making!

layout.text: Join us for a couple of hours of laughs and crafts. Whether you are after some well needed me time, on date night, looking for some wine downtime with the girls, teammate bonding, celebrating a special occasion or looking for your new creative bestie, we got you covered!
Browse Our Sunshine Coast Paint & Sip Workshops
